entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure: 102.7 kPa
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -24.2°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
